nodes.bodyText: Ooo, that's a terrible abuse of the 403 response code. Good luck to anyone wanting to implement authenticated REST APIs and trying to distinguish between needing to authenticate and not being subscribed to the topic. On the plus side we're not actually performing the check so won't affect us.

Yeah, it might be worth raising it on the spec repo. But you are right, atm we aren't enforcing it so it should be fine.
This is likely to change as the spec evolves, so we don't have to worry too much about it.
